attributes.action: Stop UK bailouts of other countries
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned believe that in the current financial climate, it is wrong to keep financially bailing out other euro-zone countries, when we firstly, are not member a of the Euro and secondly, when we having to endure an age of austerity at home.

We believe the first role of any Government is to protect its own, and not to accept liability for other countries mistakes.
